xwikidoc.title: Color Themes
xwikidoc.content: == Existing Themes == {{velocity}} * [[Default theme>>DefaultColorTheme]] * Variants #set($query = ", BaseObject as theme where doc.fullName=theme.name and theme.className='ColorThemes.ColorThemeClass' and doc.fullName<>'ColorThemes.ColorThemeTemplate' and doc.fullName<>'ColorThemes.DefaultColorTheme' order by doc.title")## #set($themeList = $xwiki.searchDocuments($query,0,0))## #foreach($theme in $themeList)## #set($themeDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($theme))## #set($themeName = $themeDoc.displayTitle)## ** [[$themeName>>$themeDoc.fullName]] #end {{/velocity}}
